TopicTitle: Last night 0.22 Twitch broadcasts uploaded somewhere?

Articles.Content: Anyone know whether last night's 0.22 preview and marathon was uploaded somewhere? Thanks!
It seems like most of it is available to view in the Videos tab of their Twitch account. I see Yargnit's, EJ's, and the official Squad one. Dunno about the ones that came after them, though.
They will all show up here: http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv/profile/pastBroadcasts

I'm still kinda bummed they're using green goo for science. They should have used apertures.

Everyone knows the best science comes from Aperture Science.

I'm still kinda bummed they're using green goo for science. They should have used apertures.

Everyone knows the best science comes from Aperture Science.

I think that would cause a little bit of lawyering from Valve.
